other_tests.findings: Atypical nodular proliferations of dermal nevomelanocytes observed in congenital melanocytic nevi. In some nevi, single and dyscohesive intraepidermal nests of atypical nevomelanocytes were identified, simulating superficial spreading melanoma.
Performed to facilitate eyelid closure and relieve astigmatism; left sector iris heterochromia was observed post-operatively.
